mapper.sql: t.dzid dzid, t.sjdzid sjdzid, t.dzlx dzlx, t.dzbm dzbm, t.dzmc dzmc, t.dzjc dzjc, t.dzdz dzdz, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.xzqh xzqh, t.lxr lxr, t.lxdh lxdh, t.czhm czhm, t.zqcls zqcls, t.zbqcs zbqcs, t.mhjzl mhjzl, t.gxsys gxsys, t.gxzddws gxzddws, t.xqmj xqmj, t.xqfw xqfw, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name dzlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DZLX = c2.CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY t.dzbm

SELECT , tcode1.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL tcode1 ON (t.xzqh = tcode1.code_value AND tcode1.codeid='61CFA4E7B188490A873395B4FB237C84') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.DZID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS dzid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,lon,lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,zqcls,zbqcs,mhjzl,gxsys,gxzddws,xqmj,xqfw,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y) VALUES(#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zbqcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mhjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gxsys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gxzddws,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.DZID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,lon,lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,zqcls,zbqcs,mhjzl,gxsys,gxzddws,xqmj,xqfw,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y) VALUES
#{item.dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzid,#{item.sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjdzid,#{item.dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlx,#{item.dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzbm,#{item.dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzmc,#{item.dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzjc,#{item.dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdz,#{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lon,#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lat,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxdh,#{item.czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czhm,#{item.zqcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqcls,#{item.zbqcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zbqcs,#{item.mhjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} mhjzl,#{item.gxsys,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gxsys,#{item.gxzddws,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gxzddws,#{item.xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xqmj,#{item.xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xqfw,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dzid = VALUES(dzid), sjdzid = VALUES(sjdzid), dzlx = VALUES(dzlx), dzbm = VALUES(dzbm), dzmc = VALUES(dzmc), dzjc = VALUES(dzjc), dzdz = VALUES(dzdz), lon = VALUES(lon), lat = VALUES(lat), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxdh = VALUES(lxdh), czhm = VALUES(czhm), zqcls = VALUES(zqcls), zbqcs = VALUES(zbqcs), mhjzl = VALUES(mhjzl), gxsys = VALUES(gxsys), gxzddws = VALUES(gxzddws), xqmj = VALUES(xqmj), xqfw = VALUES(xqfw), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y)
